name: Disney's Animated Storybook: Hercules
description: Disney's Animated Storybook: Hercules is the seventh entry in the Disney's Animated Storybook point-and-click adventure interactive storybook PC game series, based on theatrical and home video releases. The game is part of Disney's Hercules franchise, and is specifically based on the 1997 Walt Disney Animation Studios film Hercules, based on the mythical Greek hero Heracles and his defeat of the god of the underworld Hades.
